metadata.synopsis: Stug Minedale, character outside Elfsong Tavern, talking to himself if his sister Gherva isn't here.

0.speaker: Stug Minedale
0.text: When you owe money to Uktar the Guild bursar, it's safer to drink in the Elfsong than in the Guildhall. Right?

1.speaker: Stug Minedale
1.text: This better be my last drink. Can't put off settling my Guild business forever - or they'll settle it for me.
